snippet: Telecom Italia will make a bid valued at roughly 7 billion euros ($9.2 billion) for Vivendi's Brazilian broadband unit GVT, which would leave Vivendi with a 15 to 20 percent stake in the Italian group, said four people familiar with the matter....

headline.print_headline: Telecom Italia to Go Ahead With Bid for Vivendi's GVT
headline.main: Telecom Italia to Go Ahead With Bid for Vivendi's GVT

lead_paragraph: Telecom Italia will make a bid valued at roughly 7 billion euros ($9.2 billion) for Vivendi's Brazilian broadband unit GVT, which would leave Vivendi with a 15 to 20 percent stake in the Italian group, said four people familiar with the matter.
